description: Prior notification for change of use of first and second floor office space into single residential dwellings (2 no. dwellings).
decision_conditions: <p>The development shall be undertaken in full accordance with the conditions set out in the relevant part of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) (Order) 2015 (as amended or re-enacted).</p><p><br></p><p>REASON:&nbsp; To comply with the requirements of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) (Order) 2015 (as amended or re-enacted).</p>

<p>Sound insulation shall be installed between the existing commercial premises on the ground floor
 and the proposed residential unit on the first floor.&nbsp; The applicant shall provide a scheme of sound
 insulation that shall be submitted for approval to the Council’s Noise Section prior to the
 commencement of use of the two proposed residential units (first and second floors).&nbsp; </p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To obtain required sound insulation and to prevent noise nuisance.</p>

<p class="MsoNormal">The residential units shall be designed in accordance with
BS 8233:2014 - 'Guidance on sound insulation and noise reduction for buildings’
to attain the recommended noise levels for Resting, Dining and Sleeping (7am to
11pm (Day) and 11pm to 7am (Night).&nbsp; A test
shall be carried out prior to the discharge of this condition to show&nbsp;that the required noise levels have been met and
the results submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval. <o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p><p>



</p><p class="MsoNormal">REASON: To obtain required sound insulation and prevent noise
nuisance.<o:p></o:p></p>
